metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37451 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Exim before 4.96 has an invalid free in pam_converse in auths/call_pam.c because store_free is not used after store_malloc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-37451` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.1
exim4-base - 4.95-4ubuntu2.1
exim4-config - 4.95-4ubuntu2.1
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.95-4ubuntu2.1
exim4-daemon-light - 4.95-4ubuntu2.1
eximon4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is caused by store_internal_malloc being modified to store extra bytes in the following commit: https://github.com/Exim/exim/commit/1e30b0199daf7a7a882458251a3dc10d45d4c7d1

criterions.comment: exim4 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.95-4ubuntu2.1').
